outputs.srt_original:
1
00:00:00,402 --> 00:00:04,772
[JA] <v Speaker 00>音声メッセージが既存のウェブサイトを超えたコミュニケーションを実現。

2
00:00:05,515 --> 00:00:07,388
[JA] <v Speaker 00>目で見るだけだったウェブサイトに

3
00:00:07,624 --> 00:00:09,852
[JA] <v Speaker 00>音声情報をインクルードすることで

4
00:00:10,274 --> 00:00:12,315
[JA] <v Speaker 00>情報に新しい価値を与え

5
00:00:12,366 --> 00:00:14,729
[JA] <v Speaker 00>他者との差別化に効果を発揮します

6
00:00:15,674 --> 00:00:16,062
[JA] <v Speaker 00>また!

7
00:00:16,332 --> 00:00:21,580
[JA] <v Speaker 00>文字やグラフィックだけでは伝えることの難しかった感情やニュアンスを表現し

8
00:00:22,069 --> 00:00:24,449
[JA] <v Speaker 00>ユーザーの興味と理解を深めます。

9
00:00:25,478 --> 00:00:25,832
[JA] <v Speaker 00>見る

10
00:00:26,204 --> 00:00:26,659
[JA] <v Speaker 00>聞く

11
00:00:26,963 --> 00:00:28,617
[JA] <v Speaker 00>理解するウェブサイトへ

12
00:00:29,241 --> 00:00:31,907
[JA] <v Speaker 00>音声メッセージが人の心を動かします
outputs.srt_translated:
1
00:00:00,402 --> 00:00:04,772
<v Speaker 00>The audio message will bring out communication beyond the existing website.

2
00:00:05,515 --> 00:00:07,388
<v Speaker 00>I'm going to show you what I'm doing.

3
00:00:07,624 --> 00:00:09,852
<v Speaker 00>We're going to be able to do that in the next video.

4
00:00:10,274 --> 00:00:12,315
<v Speaker 00>And that's what we're going to do.

5
00:00:12,366 --> 00:00:14,729
<v Speaker 00>It's not just about being different from other people.

6
00:00:15,674 --> 00:00:16,062
<v Speaker 00>Again!

7
00:00:16,332 --> 00:00:21,580
<v Speaker 00>It's not just writing, it's graphic.

8
00:00:22,069 --> 00:00:24,449
<v Speaker 00>It will enhance the user's interest and understanding.

9
00:00:25,478 --> 00:00:25,832
<v Speaker 00>See.

10
00:00:26,204 --> 00:00:26,659
<v Speaker 00>Listen.

11
00:00:26,963 --> 00:00:28,617
<v Speaker 00>To a website that understands.

12
00:00:29,241 --> 00:00:31,907
<v Speaker 00>And that's what I'm talking about.
